DOC.detailed_description: This side-by-side split body , blind , randomize single-center study compare two different 810 nm diode laser technology purpose permanent hair reduction determine effectiveness subject 's tolerance hair reduction . Twenty volunteer enrol study . Subjects receive total 5 treatment either axilla low leg . 10 patient axilla treat 10 subject low leg treat . Placement axilla treatment group vs. low leg treatment group random . Treatment area randomize receive Soprano SHR treatment Light Sheer/Duet treatment . One extremity ( example : right axilla ) receive Soprano SHR treatment contra-lateral extremity ( example : left axilla ) receive Duet treatment . The treatment occur every 6 - 8 week follow visit 1 month , 6 month , 12 month last treatment .
